General.Name: Antar Chile
General.Description: AntarChile S.A. invests in forestry, fishing, fuel distribution, energy, mining, and other sectors in South America and internationally. The company offers forest products, including pulp, panels, and sawn wood products; distributes fuels and lubricants to aviation, power generation, transport, and ranches industries, as well as liquefied gas to residential, industrial, commercial, and technological clients; and produces fishmeal and fish oil. It also produces and sells protein foods of marine, vegetal, and animal origin; and operates processing plants and a fleet of operational vessels, as well as coal fields and other mining deposits. AntarChile S.A. was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Santiago, Chile. AntarChile S.A. is a subsidiary of Inversiones Angelini y Compañía Limitada.
General.Address: Av. El Golf 150, Santiago de Chile, Chile, 7550107
